name: Black Hole Shooter
description:
(Possible synopsis if I ever made this into a full game) The year is 2028 and a black hole has released a sentient army across the universe to end all life. However, you stumble across one on Earth with a pure heart who wishes to help you save the world.

Notes:

This is for Brackey's Game Jam.

Press escape then go to options to enable a cursor if you have trouble aiming.

Shooting can spawn mini black holes that suck in enemies and deal damage.
